attributes.action: Bring down the insurance prices for newly passed drivers
attributes.additional_details: The reason is because as new drivers who will usually obtain their licence in their teenage years the insurance quotes are impossible and unrealistic and actually quite unfair and being in the position where cars are already expensive with the high insurance quotes is a lot of added pressure and unaffordable
attributes.background: Put in a policy that overlooks or regulates how much insurance companies can charge for their policies especially for new drivers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703058
